pageContext.claim: “The Mainstream Media has never been as corrupt and deranged as it is today. FAKE NEWS is actually the biggest story of all and is the true ENEMY OF THE PEOPLE! That’s why they refuse to cover the REAL Russia Hoax….”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often levels over-the-top attacks at news organizations reporting facts he doesn't like, without providing evidence of inaccuracies or false reporting, as in this case.
